title: Pixel 2016 lagging even in safemode
content:
Hello pixel 2016 users and developers.
i have this problem with my pixel 128gb phone. after updating latest version of android my phone start lagging, for scrolling and even worse when I using keyboard. 

I already try to use safe mode, but the problem still occur. 

I also try to factory reset, it also doesn't help.

when playing games (mobile legend) the screen sometimes crashing or flickering. and i need to turn off and turn my screen back on to fix that.

does anyone have the same problem? is that anyway to fix it? 
or should I downgrade the android version?
